channel.title: Help with JDK /J Java
channel.description:
During compiling/running I get this error or the error that I do not have JDK installed.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
Help? I do believe I installed JDK but perhaps not, can anyone give me an appropriate link to a site where I can download anything that I need and folder destination of where I should download the files?

item.title: Help with JDK /J Java
item.dc:creator: @AltoonaBlows AltoonaBlows
item.description:
@AltoonaBlows wrote:

I’m a complete idiot when it comes to this, can you please describe to me how this can be done? I haven’t touched anything in the folder after I download it. (Except to compile / run) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 12:52:04 PM[/size][hr]I’m using Winrar and when I right click on compile.bat it does not have an option to edit.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 12:54:42 PM[/size][hr]Alright, well I figured out how to edit it then I did. Now when I run it, it gives me the error -

error: cannot read: *.java
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Help with JDK /J Java
item.dc:creator: @mr13 mr.
item.description:
@mr13 wrote:

right click on compile, click edit, and paste this where the old one is and save.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Help with JDK /J Java
item.dc:creator: @Shadowland Shadowland
item.description:
@Shadowland wrote:

The file client.class is missing… you should make sure it’s actually there before you try to run the program.

Read full topic
